sledgehammer.interfaces

Interface PermissionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PermissionsListener

    public interface PermissionListener
    Interface for future alternative Module implementations for permissions. This is to keep the internal design of the default permissions module clean and support open alternatives for handling permissions.
    Author:
    Jab

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDefaultPermission(java.lang.String node, boolean flag)
      Sets a default permission flag.
      boolean hasDefaultPermission(java.lang.String node) 
      boolean hasPermission(Player player, java.lang.String node)
      (Interface Method from PermissionListener)
      void setPermission(Player player, java.lang.String node, java.lang.Boolean flag)
      (Interface Method from PermissionListener)

    • Method Detail

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(Player player,
                      java.lang.String node)
        (Interface Method from PermissionListener)

        This method returns whether or not a Player is authorized for a given String permission node.

        Parameters:
        player - The Player being tested.
        node - The String node being tested.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Player is authorized with the given String node.

      • setPermission

        void setPermission(Player player,
                   java.lang.String node,
                   java.lang.Boolean flag)
        (Interface Method from PermissionListener)

        This method sets a permission for whether or not a Player is authorized for a given String permission node.

        Parameters:
        player - The Player the permission is being set.
        node - The String node being set.
        flag - The flag for the node to be explicitly authorized or denied.

      • addDefaultPermission

        void addDefaultPermission(java.lang.String node,
                          boolean flag)
        Sets a default permission flag.

        (This is useful for Modules with dynamic commands that may need to be granted for default players)

        Parameters:
        node - The String permission node being set.
        flag - The flag to set for the permission node.

      • hasDefaultPermission

        boolean hasDefaultPermission(java.lang.String node)
        Parameters:
        node - The String permission node being checked.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the permission node is granted by default.
